description.name: 7-function metal adjustable spray gun SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 7-Function Metal Garden Spray Gun – Versatility and Comfort for Watering!


The SKY-LINE 7-Function Metal Garden Spray Gun is a reliable tool for watering and cleaning. Equipped with an adjustable nozzle featuring 7 spray modes (FULL, ANGLE, SHOWER, FLAT, CENTER, MIST, CONE), it allows you to tailor the water flow for various applications. Its durable aluminum body ensures longevity, while the non-slip rubberized handle provides comfort and a secure grip. Perfect for gardens, car washing, and household chores.


Product Features:


7-Function Adjustable Nozzle – Choose the right watering mode for your needs:



  • FULL – Strong, full stream

  • ANGLE – Angled spray

  • SHOWER – Gentle shower

  • FLAT – Flat stream

  • CENTER – Centralized stream

  • MIST – Fine mist

  • CONE – Conical spray


Durable Aluminum Construction – A sturdy, damage-resistant body ensures long-lasting performance.


Non-Slip Rubberized Handle – Provides a comfortable grip and secure handling, even during extended use.


Key Features:



  • 7 water spray functions for full control

  • Lightweight and durable aluminum body

  • Comfortable, non-slip handle

  • Universal hose connector for easy attachment

description.name: Adjustable spray gun SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
The SKY-LINE Garden Spray Gun is a dependable tool for watering your garden and washing various surfaces. Made from durable plastic with an additional rubberized coating, it ensures a secure grip and comfortable handling. Equipped with an adjustable spray nozzle, it allows precise water flow adjustment, from a gentle mist to a powerful jet.


Product Features:



  • Durable construction – Made from damage-resistant ABS + TPR plastic.

  • Ergonomic handle – Rubberized for comfort and a secure grip.

  • Adjustable nozzle – Easily customize the water spray type.

  • Trigger lock – Enables continuous use without constant squeezing.

  • Universal application – Perfect for watering plants, washing cars, and cleaning patios.


Applications:



  • Watering plants and lawns

  • Washing cars and bicycles

  • Cleaning patios, facades, and garden furniture

description.name: 8-function adjustable spray gun SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 8-Function Garden Spray Gun – Durable and Versatile for All Your Watering Needs!


The SKY-LINE 8-Function Garden Spray Gun is a sturdy and multifunctional tool designed for watering plants, washing cars, and other garden tasks. It features 8 spray modes, a non-slip grip, and an ergonomic trigger lock for added convenience. Its durable construction ensures long-lasting performance!


Versatility and Adjustable Spray Modes


The SKY-LINE Spray Gun offers 8 different spray patterns, allowing you to customize the water flow for various applications:



  • FULL – Powerful full stream

  • ANGLE – Angled spray

  • SHOWER – Gentle shower

  • SOAKER – Heavy watering

  • FLAT – Wide stream

  • CENTER – Concentrated stream

  • MIST – Fine mist

  • CONE – Conical spray


Durable Construction


Made from high-quality plastic, this spray gun is resistant to damage and harsh weather conditions, ensuring long-term reliability.


User-Friendly Design



  • Non-slip rubberized grip provides a secure hold, even with wet hands.

  • Ergonomic trigger with a lock function allows for comfortable, extended use.

description.name: Adjustable hose nozzle SKY-LINE series – display box
15 holes adjustable oscillating sprinkler SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
Adjustable Oscillating Sprinkler with 15 Nozzles SKY-LINE – Precise and Efficient Irrigation!


The SKY-LINE Adjustable Oscillating Sprinkler is a modern solution for effective garden irrigation. Equipped with 15 nozzles and an adjustable spray angle, it allows you to tailor the water flow to different areas. Its lightweight and durable plastic body ensures long-lasting performance. Ideal for lawns, flower beds, and vegetable gardens.


Product Features:



  • 15 precision nozzles – Even water distribution for efficient irrigation of large areas.

  • Adjustable spray angle – Customize the sprinkler’s range to suit your garden by adjusting the width and direction of watering.

  • Durable plastic body – Weather-resistant, lightweight, and stable construction.


Key Features:



  • 15 precision nozzles for optimal hydration

  • Adjustable spray angle for better coverage

  • Sturdy and lightweight plastic construction

  • Universal connector compatible with standard garden hoses

description.name: Adjustable impulse sprinkler SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE Adjustable Rotating Pulsating Sprinkler – Precise Irrigation for Your Garden!


The SKY-LINE pulsating sprinkler is a reliable solution for efficient watering of gardens, lawns, and crops. Made from high-quality ABS plastic, it ensures durability and resistance to weather conditions. With an adjustable spraying range from 45° to 360°, it allows you to customize the coverage area to your specific needs. It covers a diameter of up to 24 meters, making it ideal for watering large areas effectively.


Product Features:



  • Ground spike design – Ensures stable anchoring in the soil for precise operation.

  • High-quality ABS plastic – Durable and resistant to damage and weather conditions.

  • Adjustable water flow – Allows you to control the intensity of irrigation based on plant needs.

  • Adjustable spray range from 45° to 360° – Precisely set the desired coverage area.

  • Expandable system – Connect multiple sprinklers using the built-in connector for a comprehensive irrigation system.

  • Watering coverage up to 24 meters in diameter – Perfect for medium and large gardens.


Key Benefits:



  • Durable ABS construction for long-lasting performance

  • Full adjustment of spray angle and intensity

  • Compatible with multiple sprinklers for system expansion

  • Easy ground installation for stable operation

description.name: Zraszacz FLOWER 8-funkcji SKY-LINE (48)
description.long_desc:
Zraszacz FLOWER 8-funkcyjny SKY-LINE – efektywne i estetyczne nawadnianie!

Zraszacz FLOWER 8-funkcyjny SKY-LINE to stylowe i praktyczne rozwiązanie do nawadniania ogrodu. 8 funkcji zraszania pozwala dopasować tryb podlewania do różnych roślin i powierzchni. Dzięki promieniowi zraszania do 8 m skutecznie nawadnia większe obszary. Trwała konstrukcja z tworzywa sztucznego zapewnia długą żywotność i odporność na warunki atmosferyczne.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • 8 funkcji zraszania – wybierz optymalny tryb podlewania dostosowany do potrzeb Twojego ogrodu!
  • Promień zraszania do 8 m – skuteczne nawadnianie większych powierzchni, bez konieczności częstego przestawiania zraszacza.
  • Wytrzymały korpus z tworzywa sztucznego – odporny na uszkodzenia i warunki atmosferyczne, zapewniający długą żywotność.

Najważniejsze cechy:

  • 8 trybów zraszania dla pełnej kontroli nad podlewaniem
  • Promień zraszania do 8 m – optymalne pokrycie terenu
  • Solidna konstrukcja z odpornego tworzywa sztucznego
  • Kompatybilny z szybkozłączkami do węży ogrodowych

description.name: 3-arm rotating sprinkler SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE Three-Arm Rotating Sprinkler – Effective and Even Irrigation!


The SKY-LINE Three-Arm Rotating Sprinkler is an efficient tool for garden irrigation. Equipped with three rotating arms, it ensures even water distribution. With a spray radius of up to 10 meters, it is perfect for covering large areas. The durable plastic construction guarantees longevity and resistance to weather conditions. Ideal for watering lawns, flowers, and vegetable beds.


Product Features:



  • Three rotating arms with multiple nozzles – Provides wide and even water coverage, perfect for large areas.

  • Up to 10-meter spray radius – Efficient watering without the need for frequent repositioning.

  • Durable plastic body – Weather-resistant, lightweight, and long-lasting.


Key Features:



  • Three rotating arms for optimal irrigation

  • Up to 10-meter spray radius for extensive coverage

  • Sturdy and lightweight plastic construction

  • Universal connector compatible with standard quick couplings

description.name: 1/2" 4pcs hose connector set SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 4-Piece Garden Accessories Set 1/2" – A Complete Irrigation Solution!


The SKY-LINE 4-Piece Garden Accessories Set is a comprehensive solution for watering and cleaning. The set includes an adjustable spray nozzle, two 1/2" quick connectors (one with a stop function), and a 3/4" tap connector with a 1/2" reducer. The non-slip rubberized grip ensures comfort and a secure hold, even in challenging conditions. Thanks to its durable construction and compatibility with quick connectors, this set guarantees convenience and reliability for everyday use.


Product Features:



  • Adjustable spray nozzle – Customize the water flow to your needs, from a gentle mist to a powerful jet.

  • Two 1/2" quick connectors – One with a stop function, allowing quick disconnection of accessories without water leakage.

  • 3/4" tap connector with a 1/2" reducer – Universally fits most faucets, ensuring a stable connection.

  • Non-slip rubberized grip – Provides comfort and a secure hold, even with wet hands.


Key Features:



  • Adjustable nozzle for different watering modes

  • Two quick connectors, including one with a stop function for ease of use

  • 3/4" tap connector with a 1/2" reducer – fits most installations

  • Non-slip rubberized grip for comfort and a firm hold

  • Made of durable, weather-resistant plastic

description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 1/2" Quick Connector – Convenient and Secure Connection!


The SKY-LINE 1/2" Quick Connector is a practical solution for your garden irrigation system. Made from durable plastic with an additional rubber coating, it ensures a secure grip and easy handling. Compatible with standard 1/2" garden hoses.


Product Features:



  • Durable plastic construction – Sturdy and resistant to mechanical damage and weather conditions.

  • Extra rubber coating – Provides a non-slip grip, making installation and removal easy, even with wet hands.


Key Features:



  • Strong construction made from high-quality plastic

  • Non-slip rubberized surface for easier handling

  • Universal compatibility – fits all 1/2" garden hoses

description.name: 1/2" waterstop hose connector SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 1/2" Quick Connector with Stop – Convenient and Secure Connection!


The SKY-LINE 1/2" Quick Connector with Stop is a practical solution for your garden irrigation system. The Water Stop function allows for quick disconnection of accessories without water leakage. Made from durable plastic with an additional rubber coating, it ensures a secure grip and easy handling. Compatible with standard 1/2" garden hoses.


Product Features:



  • Automatic stop mechanism – Disconnecting the hose from the accessory automatically stops the water flow, preventing spills and water waste.

  • Durable plastic construction – Sturdy and resistant to mechanical damage and weather conditions.

  • Extra rubber coating – Provides a non-slip grip, making installation and removal easy, even with wet hands.


Key Features:



  • Water Stop system – Automatically stops water flow when disconnected

  • Strong construction made from high-quality plastic

  • Non-slip rubberized surface for easier handling

  • Universal compatibility – fits all 1/2" garden hoses

description.name: 2-way distributor with independent valves SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 2-Way Splitter 3/4" with 1/2" Reducer and Two Valves – Full Control Over Irrigation!


The SKY-LINE 2-way splitter is a practical solution for managing water flow in garden irrigation systems. Featuring a 3/4" tap connection with a 1/2" reducer, it is compatible with most standard water installations. Two independent shut-off valves allow precise control of water flow, enabling the simultaneous connection of two hoses and adjusting their operation as needed.


Product Features:



  • Universal 3/4" connection with 1/2" reducer – Fits most faucets and irrigation systems.

  • Two independent shut-off valves – Control water flow separately for each outlet.

  • Two connectors compatible with standard garden quick connectors – Quick and easy hose connection.

  • Durable construction – Made of high-quality plastic resistant to weather conditions and damage.

  • Ergonomic design – Convenient knobs for easy flow adjustment.


Key Benefits:



  • Ability to connect two garden hoses simultaneously

  • Independent water flow control for each outlet

  • Compatibility with standard garden quick connectors

  • Durable and weather-resistant material

description.name: 1" tap connector with 3/4" & 1/2" reducers SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE 1" Tap Connector with 3/4" and 1/2" Reducers


The SKY-LINE 1" Tap Connector with 3/4" and 1/2" Reducers is a practical and durable solution for connecting garden hoses. Made from high-quality plastic, it ensures a tight and leak-proof connection. Thanks to the included reducers, it fits various thread sizes, making it a versatile component of any irrigation system.


Product Features:



  • High-quality construction – Made from durable plastic, providing longevity and resistance to mechanical damage and weather conditions.

  • Universal compatibility – Fits 1" threaded taps, with reducers for 3/4" and 1/2" threads for easy adaptability.

  • Quick and easy installation – Compatible with quick-connect systems, allowing for fast and effortless hose connection.

  • Secure and leak-proof connection – Thoughtfully designed to ensure a stable fit, preventing water leaks.


Technical Specifications:



  • Thread size: 1" (with reducers for 3/4" and 1/2")

  • Material: ABS plastic

  • Compatibility: Quick-connect systems

  • Color: Black and blue

description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE Quick Connector Y-Splitter – Efficient Connection for Your Irrigation System!


The SKY-LINE Quick Connector Y-Splitter is a practical garden accessory that allows you to split the water flow into two garden hoses. Made from high-quality, durable plastic, it ensures long-lasting performance and resistance to weather conditions.


Product Features:



  • Universal compatibility – Fits standard garden hose quick connectors.

  • Durable construction – Resistant to damage and harsh weather conditions.

  • Easy installation – Quick and convenient tool-free connection.

  • Water flow splitter – Perfect for connecting two hoses to a single water source.

The SKY-LINE garden quick connector nipple is a functional and durable solution for connecting garden hoses. description.name: Ground hose guide SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE Ground Spike Hose Guide – Efficient and Plant-Friendly Watering!


The SKY-LINE Ground Spike Hose Guide is an essential accessory for every gardener. It guides the garden hose smoothly, preventing damage to plants and lawns. The rotating rollers reduce friction, making watering more convenient. A sturdy steel spike ensures easy insertion into the ground and provides excellent stability.


Product Features:



  • Durable construction – Made from high-quality plastic, resistant to weather conditions.

  • Stable and long-lasting – Steel ground spike allows for easy insertion and secure hose guidance.

  • Plant and lawn protection – Prevents accidental damage from a moving hose.

  • Rotating rollers – Enable smooth hose movement while minimizing friction.

  • Easy installation – Quick and hassle-free setup anywhere in the garden.


Specifications:



  • Material: Durable plastic + steel

  • Ground spike: Yes

  • Rotating rollers: Yes

  • Application: Garden hoses

description.name: Garden hose corner guide SKY-LINE series
description.long_desc:
SKY-LINE Corner Hose Guide – Stable and Durable Solution!


The SKY-LINE Corner Hose Guide is the perfect solution for preventing hose tangling and kinking. Equipped with four guiding rollers, it ensures smooth hose movement while protecting your lawn and plants. Made from durable, weather-resistant plastic, it is ideal for installation at corners, walls, and fences.


Product Features:



  • Secure hose guidance – Prevents tangling and kinking, making garden watering easier.

  • Four guiding rollers – Ensure smooth hose movement, reducing friction and enhancing user comfort.

  • Strong construction – Made from high-quality plastic, resistant to weather conditions and mechanical damage.

  • Easy installation – Simple setup in the desired location, perfect for garden corners, walls, or fences.

  • Lawn protection – Effectively shields plants and lawn surfaces from hose-related damage.
